attributes.action: 4 day week (Wednesday off) - better for economy
attributes.additional_details: Not only does a 4 day work week increase employee satisfaction, company commitment and teamwork, but it also decreases stress levels. Even better, reducing employees' work schedules to a 4 day work week doesn't harm their productivity or company output.
attributes.background: Discuss the effect on what a busy schedule on a persons mental health. As well as discussing the advantages of having a charter work week

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government aren't responsible for the issue you raise. UK law places limits on the total amount of time someone can work during a week and the minimum amount they can be paid an hour, but it doesn't specify how many or which days of the week they have to work. This would be a decision for employers and employees.

We could accept a petition calling for the maximum number of hours worked during a week to be reduced, if this is something you would like to see happen.
